# ResolvedModel3D

**Structure**

A view for displaying static three-dimensional models.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct ResolvedModel3D
```

## Overview

You don’t instantiate this type directly, instead [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Model3D] creates instances for you.

## Instance Methods

- **resizable(_:)**: Allows this model to resize itself to fit its container.

## SwiftUI 3D model presentation

- **Model3D**: A view that asynchronously loads and displays a 3D model.
- **Model3DPhase**: The current phase of the asynchronous model loading operation.
- **Model3DPlaceholderContent**: A container view that presents either a 3D model or a placeholder for one.
- **Model3DAsset**: A container used to represent the asset loaded into the Model3D View.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- View
